trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Offre supporto in fase di progettazione per i controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> provides a design-time representation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control with a menu to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property for the convenience of the page developer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> fornisce una rappresentazione in fase di progettazione di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controllo con un menu per accedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> insieme e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> proprietà per agevolare lo sviluppatore della pagina.

trans-unit.source: It is the only zone designer that does not support designer regions.
trans-unit.target: È la finestra di progettazione solo zona che non supporta le aree della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls uses links to create connections instead of a drag-and-drop user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: In questo modo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controlli utilizzano collegamenti per creare connessioni anziché un'interfaccia di trascinamento e rilascio utente (UI).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property both appear on the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> insieme e il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> proprietà vengono entrambi visualizzati nel menu dei verbi di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controllo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, when selected, provides a selection of color schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, se selezionato, fornisce una selezione di combinazioni di colori.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> check box, when selected, displays the contents of the control as it would appear in the browser; the control will be empty until a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> casella di controllo, se selezionata, consente di visualizzare il contenuto del controllo come viene visualizzata nel browser, il controllo sarà vuoto finché non viene stabilita una connessione.

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> to support a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control as with any other control designer.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ereditare da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> per supportare un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controllare come con qualsiasi altra finestra di progettazione di controllo.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the markup that renders the control.
trans-unit.target: È possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> metodo per modificare il markup che esegue il rendering del controllo.

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> with a custom scheme.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile sostituire il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> raccolta a cui aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> con uno schema personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to hide additional properties from a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come nascondere proprietà aggiuntive da un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controllo eseguendo l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta degli schemi di formattazione automatica predefiniti da visualizzare nella finestra di dialogo **Formattazione automatica** per il controllo associato in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: A predefined <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> with a default ConnectionZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> predefinito con uno schema ConnectionZone predefinito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property overrides its base implementation to get a predefined collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> proprietà esegue l'override dell'implementazione di base per ottenere una raccolta predefinita specifica per la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il markup utilizzato per rappresentare il controllo in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the markup to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.String" /> che corrisponde al markup utilizzato per rappresentare il controllo in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> associato alla finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Associa la finestra di progettazione al controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> dell'insieme di proprietà associate al controllo.

trans-unit.source: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Nasconde un gruppo preimpostato di proprietà in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method overrides the parent method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> metodo esegue l'override del metodo padre per nascondere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> proprietà nella finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This is because the properties in question are not rendered by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls and are therefore not relevant.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo le proprietà in questione non viene eseguite da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controlli e sono pertanto non rilevanti.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di come eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> metodo, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> Cenni preliminari sulla classe.
